examples.example: 我仿佛听见鸟儿在枝头欢快地歌唱。

translate.english: I seem to hear the birds singing merrily on the branch.

examples.example: 我走在路上，忽然听见有人在喊我的名字。

translate.english: I was walking on the road when suddenly I heard someone calling my name.

examples.example: 我总能在清晨听见鸟儿悦耳的叫声，那声音令人心旷神怡。

translate.english: I can always hear the pleasant chirping of birds in the early morning, and that sound is refreshing.
